DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treatment effective preventing fracture woman postmenopausal osteoporosis
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Efficacy Safety Romosozumab Treatment Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman osteoporosis high risk fracture define : 1. hip BMD Tscore ≤2.5 SD vertebral fracture 2. hip BMD Tscore ≤2.0 SD recent hip fracture two vertebral fracture . History metabolic bone disease ( except osteoporosis ) Use agent affect bone metabolism Vitamin D insufficiency History solid organ bone marrow transplant Hyper hypocalcemia Hyper hypothyroidism Hyper hypoparathyroidism Possible sign intolerance Alendronate
DOC.keyword: Osteoporosis , Osteoporosis-postmenopausal , Bone Diseases-Metabolic , Bone Diseases , Musculoskeletal Diseases
